lacrosse have received enthusiastic support.

lessons in each session With the
equipment being provided by the

New Gym Classes
For Five Sports
On Open Basis
The three sessions of the new
voluntary program of the Department of Physical Education
will be from February 3 to
March 6, March 10 to April 17,
and April 21 to May 22.
The program will include instruction, play and practice in
five sports — badminton, golf,
tennis, weiiht-lifting and wrestling. Other sports may be included if enough interest is
shown. Thus far both judo and
lacrosse have received enthusiastic support.
The courses will include nine
lessons in each session With the
equipment being provided by the
Hopkins. Sign-up lists are available in the gymnasium. There
will be neither class cards nor
attendance requirements. The
program is open to all students
of the University.
